channel.title: Messed up computer screen
channel.description: While playing black mesa i crouched turned on my flashlight and pressed f11/f12 this caused black mesa to go black screen. Then i exited black mesa and found that my computer resolution shrunk to 800x600 and the colors where messed up and broken any idea how to fix this?

item.title: Messed up computer screen
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Try changing the settings back to where they were before you had this issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Messed up computer screen

item.description:
While playing black mesa i crouched turned on my flashlight and pressed f11/f12 this caused black mesa to go black screen. Then i exited black mesa and found that my computer resolution shrunk to 800x600 and the colors where messed up and broken any idea how to fix this?
